text: zameen mein jo chalane phirane vaala (haivaan) ya apane donon paron se udane vaala parinda hai unakee bhee tumhaaree tarah jamaaten hain aur sab ke sab lauh mahaphooz mein maujood (hain) hamane kitaab (quraan) mein koee baat nahin chhodee hai phir sab ke sab (charind hon ya parind) apane paravaradigaar ke huzoor mein lae jaayenge.
